name: Agreed settlement
description: An adjustment made based on an agreement between partners.

name: Below specification goods
description: Goods of inferior quality.

name: Damaged goods
description: An adjustment due to the damage of goods.

name: Short delivery
description: An adjustment made because the delivered quantity was less than expected.

name: Price query
description: An adjustment due to a price query.

name: Proof of delivery required
description: The buyer requires that proof of delivery be made before payment.

name: Payment on account
description: Buyer is to make payment later.

name: Returnable container charge included
description: Adjustment made to deduct the returnable container charge.

name: Invoice error
description: Invoice not in accordance with the order.

name: Costs for draft
description: Cost of draft has been deducted from payment.

name: Bank charges
description: Bank charges have been deducted from payment.

name: Agent commission
description: Agent commission has been deducted from payment.

name: Counter claim
description: Buyer claims an existing (financial) obligation from seller which (partly) offsets the outstanding invoice(s).

name: Wrong delivery
description: Delivery not according to specifications.

name: Goods returned to agent
description: Goods returned to agent.

name: Goods partly returned
description: Goods partly returned.

name: Transport damage
description: Goods damaged in transit.

name: Goods on consignment
description: Buyer does not accept invoice(s) charge as it relates to goods where the ownership remains with the seller until sold.

name: Trade discount
description: Trade discount deducted from payment.

name: Deduction for late delivery
description: Penalty amount deducted for later delivery.

name: Advertising costs
description: Advertising costs deducted from payment.

name: Customs duties
description: Customs duties deducted from payment.

name: Telephone and postal costs
description: Telephone and postal costs deducted from payment.

name: Repair costs
description: Repair costs deducted from payment.

name: Attorney fees
description: Attorney fees deducted from payment.

name: Taxes
description: Taxes deducted from payment.

name: Reclaimed deduction
description: Buyer reclaims an unspecified deduction from the invoice(s) (to be) paid.

name: See separate advice
description: Buyer or seller refers to separate correspondence about a related shipment(s) and/or invoice(s) and/or a payment(s).

name: Buyer refused to take delivery
description: Buyer refused to take delivery.

name: Direct payment to seller
description: Buyer states to have paid to seller.

name: Buyer disagrees with due date
description: Buyer disagrees with due date.

name: Goods not delivered
description: Buyer has not received the goods.

name: Late delivery
description: Goods delivered too late.

name: Quoted as paid to you
description: Factor informs the seller that a certain invoice(s) was paid by the buyer directly to the seller.

name: Goods returned
description: Buyer returned the goods to seller.

name: Invoice not received
description: Buyer claims he did not receive the invoice for which payment is requested.

name: Credit note to debtor/not to us
description: Factor informs the seller that he did not receive copy of a credit note sent to the buyer.

name: Deducted bonus
description: Buyer has/will deduct a bonus he is entitled to from the payment.

name: Deducted discount
description: Buyer has/will deduct the discount he is entitled to from the payment.

name: Deducted freight costs
description: Buyer has/will deduct freight costs from the payment.

name: Deduction against other invoices
description: Deduction against invoices already settled.

name: Credit balance(s)
description: Buyer makes use of existing credit balance(s) to offset (partly) the outstanding invoice(s).

name: Reason unknown
description: Factor informs the seller that the reason of a commercial dispute raised by the buyer is unknown.

name: Awaiting message from seller
description: Buyer or factor are waiting for a (reply) message from the seller before a commercial dispute can be settled.

name: Debit note to seller
description: Buyer issued debit note to seller.

name: Discount beyond terms
description: Buyer has taken a discount larger than the discount terms agreed with the seller.

name: See buyer's letter
description: See correspondence from buyer.

name: Allowance/charge error
description: Error made by seller in the amount of allowance/charge.

name: Substitute product
description: Product delivered not fully according to specification.

name: Terms of sale error
description: Terms of sale not according to purchase order.

name: Required data missing
description: A message sent by buyer to seller or by seller to buyer did not contain data required to take action/decision.

name: Wrong invoice
description: Invoice issued to wrong party.

name: Duplicate invoice
description: Invoice sent twice.

name: Weight error
description: Weight not in accordance with the order.

name: Additional charge not authorized
description: Additional charge not authorised.

name: Incorrect discount
description: Buyer states that calculated discount on the invoice(s) is wrongly calculated.

name: Price change
description: Price has been changed.

name: Variation
description: The adjustment is a variation from an agreed value.

name: Chargeback
description: Balance of one or more items charged back to seller.

name: Offset
description: Allocation of one or more debit items to one or more credit items or vice-versa.

name: Indirect payment
description: Payment in settlement of an invoice has been made to a party other than the designated creditor.

name: Financial reassignment
description: Previously assigned invoice/credit note is being reassigned.

name: Reinstatement of chargeback/offset
description: Reversal or cancellation of a chargeback and/or offset relating to an incorrect balance.

name: Expecting new terms
description: Buyer expects that seller revises the terms of payment of an invoice.

name: Settlement to agent
description: Invoice has been/to be paid to seller's agent.

name: Cash discount
description: An adjustment has been made due to the application of a cash discount.

name: Delcredere costs
description: Costs deducted from a total amount to pay for the services of central payment.

name: Early payment allowance adjustment
description: Adjustment results from the application of an early payment allowance.

name: Incorrect due date for monetary amount
description: Adjustment has been made because an incorrect due date was referred to with regard to the monetary amount.

name: Wrong monetary amount resulting from incorrect free goods
description: quantity Adjustment has been made because of a wrong monetary amount resulting from an incorrect free goods quantity.

name: Rack or shelf replenishment service by a supplier
description: Adjustment due to the replenishment of the racks or shelves by a supplier.

name: Temporary special promotion
description: Adjustment due to a temporary special promotion.

name: Difference in tax rate
description: Adjustment due to a difference in tax rate.

name: Quantity discount
description: Adjustment due to a quantity discount.

name: Promotion discount
description: Adjustment due to a promotion discount.

name: Cancellation deadline passed
description: The cancellation has occurred after the deadline.

name: Pricing discount
description: An adjustment has been made due to the application of a pricing discount.

name: Volume discount
description: Discount for reaching or exceeding an agreed accumulated volume.

name: Sundry discount
description: Adjustment has been made due to the application of a sundry discount.

name: Card holder signature missing
description: The adjustment was made due to the card holder not signing the filing document.

name: Card expiry date missing
description: The adjustment was made due to the card acceptor not specifying the expiry date within the filing document.

name: Card number error
description: The adjustment was made due to the card acceptor specifying an erroneous card number within the filing document.

name: Card expired
description: The adjustment was made due to the card acceptor specifying an expired expiry date within the filing document or electronic data.

name: Test card transaction
description: The adjustment was made due to a test card transaction, used for installing, maintaining or debugging purposes.

name: Permission limit exceeded
description: The adjustment was made due to the permission limit defined by card issuer or card company was exceeded without prior authorisation. Synonym: Floor limit.

name: Wrong authorisation code
description: The adjustment was made due to the authorisation code provided did not fit to the specified transaction.

name: Wrong authorised amount
description: The adjustment was made due to the specified amount not meeting the authorised amount for the transaction.

name: Authorisation failed
description: The adjustment was made due to the authorisation needed had failed.

name: Card acceptor data error
description: The adjustment was made due to the data regarding the card acceptor is erroneous.

name: Treasury management service charge
description: Charge for the service of treasury management.

name: Agreed discount
description: The reason for the adjustment is that a mutually agreed discount has been applied.

name: Expediting fee
description: The reason for the adjustment is that a fee for expediting has been applied.

name: Invoicing fee
description: The reason for the adjustment is that a fee for invoicing has been applied.

name: Freight charge
description: The reason for the adjustment is that freight charges has been applied.

name: Small order processing service charge
description: The reason for the adjustment is that a fee for processing of a small order (an order below a defined threshold) has been applied.

name: Currency exchange differences
description: An adjustment made due to a change in a currency exchange rate.

name: Insolvency
description: An adjustment made due to the partner's inability to pay open debts.

name: Incorrect references
description: Adjustment has taken place because of incorrect references.

name: Incorrect identification of the buyer
description: Adjustment has taken place because of incorrect identification of the buyer.

name: Incorrect product identification
description: Adjustment has taken place because of incorrect product identification.

name: New employee
description: The reason for the adjustment is a new employee.

name: Employee retirement
description: The reason for the adjustment is the retirement of an employee.

name: Salary change
description: The reason for the adjustment is a salary change.

name: Parental leave
description: The reason for the adjustment is a parental leave.

name: Mutually defined
description: A code assigned within a code list to be used on an interim basis and as defined among trading partners until a precise code can be assigned to the code list. Data Element Cross Reference DataElement 4465 is used in the following Batch Segments: AJT DataElement 4465 is used in the following Interactive Composite Elements:
